starter.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a small amount of food eaten at the start of a meal before the main part
starter.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We had soup as a starter, followed by steak.
starter.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a person, horse, car etc that is in a race when it starts
starter.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Of the seven starters, only three finished the race.
starter.translation[0].definitions[2].de: someone who gives the signal for a race to begin
